description: Detects scheduled task creation events that include suspicious actions, and is run once at 00:00
name: Uncommon Scheduled Task Once 00:00
query: ((process.executable:*\\schtasks.exe* AND process.command_line:(*wscript* OR *vbscript* OR *cscript* OR *wmic\ * OR *wmic.exe* OR *regsvr32.exe* OR *powershell* OR *\\AppData\\*)) AND ((process.command_line:*once* AND process.command_line:*00\:00*) OR process.command_line:*Joke*))
author: pH-T
